column1: Little Goat Diner////We had the sweet kitchen space to ourselves and were greeted with smiles and snacks.  I wanted to scoop the crab dip into my purse for later.  I'm like a tacky grandma in that way.  We tried a ton of family style menu items
column2: the highlight of which was the goat leg.  If you're doing an event there
column3: it is well worth adding.  Everything we tried was great and the cocktails were also fabulous.
